original_text: A person who makes a certain day special does that so that he can respect the Lord. A person who eats all kinds of food does that so that he can respect the Lord. He thanks God for the food that he eats. A person who refuses to eat certain foods also does that so that he can respect the Lord. And he also thanks God.
korean_text: 날을 중히 여기는 자도 주를 위하여 중히 여기고 먹는 자도 주를 위하여 먹으니 이는 하나님께 감사함이요 먹지 않는 자도 주를 위하여 먹지 아니하며 하나님께 감사하느니라

sentences.original_text: A person who makes a certain day special
does that so that he can respect the Lord
A person who eats all kinds of food
does that so that he can respect the Lord
He thanks God for the food that he eats
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 먹는 음식에 대해 하나님께 감사합니다

sentences.original_text: A person who refuses to eat certain foods
also does that so that he can respect the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 주님을 존경하기 위해 그렇게 합니다
